verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%> of the passover <S%G3957><s%>, <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he should depart <S%G3327><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> his Father <S%G3962><s%>, having loved <S%G25><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> that were <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, he loved <S%G25><s%> them <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> during <S%G1096><s%> supper <S%G1173><s%>, the devil <S%G1228><s%> having <S%G906><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> put <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> of Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot <S%G2469><s%>, Simon <S%G4613><s%>'s son <S%G2443><s%>, to betray <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%>,
